Articles.Content:
So, I've been playing KSP lately and I've had a nice glowing outline when I moused over a part in staging (it did glow through other parts, too). Now, I don't have it, the part is lightly glowing now instead of the outline (and it doesn't show through the parts).

I have to say that it's much harder to see if you're looking for a small part in a giant rocket!
